titles.title: Taxpayer Repayment Act of 2009

To require the Secretary of the Treasury to develop a strategy and timeline for the repayment of assistance received by financial institutions under the Troubled Asset Relief Program, and for other purposes.
Taxpayer Repayment Act of 2009

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Financial Services.

bill.summary: Taxpayer Repayment Act of 2009 - Directs the Secretary of the Treasury to develop, and provide Congress with, a strategy and timeline for financial institutions to repay Troubled Asset Relief Program (TARP) funds.
